pageProduct.name: Viviscal Man Supplement for Men 60
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Viviscal Hair Growth Supplement for Men is scientifically formulated with AminoMar C - Marine protein complex. Helps to reduce hair loss and increase hair regrowth in men.

Uses:
Help to reduce hair loss and increase hair regrowth in men.
At Viviscal, we understand hair. Viviscal Man supplements are scientifically formulated for men with the exclusive marine protein complex AminoMar C™ combined with the nutrients Zinc, Vitamin C and Linseed which help to reduce hair loss and increase hair regrowth in men.

Suitable For: Men

Boxed Contents: 60 Tablets, Film coated

Size: 60 Tablets

Warnings

Not to be taken by children, pregnant or breastfeeding women or those who have had a heart attack, surgery or major accident. Do not take in conjunction with other medication unless advised by a healthcare practitioner. In the event of an allergic reaction, cease use and see your doctor immediately. If symptoms persist, consult your healthcare practitioner. Keep out of reach of children. Vitamin supplements should not replace a balanced diet.

Each tablet is individually sealed. Do not use if seal is cut, torn or broken.

Ingredients

Active Ingredients: Only Viviscal supplements contain AminoMar C™

Each Tablet contains:
Shark Cartilage (From AminoMar C™) 377mg
Malpighia Glabra (Acerola) Fruit Powder 10.6mg
Equivalent to Ascorbic Acid 1.8mg
Equisetum Arvense (Horsetail) Stem Extact Dry Conc. 30mg
Equiv. Dry Stem 165mg
Linum Ustitatissimum (Flaxseed) Seed Extract Dry Conc. 50mg
Equiv. Dry Seed 3g
Ascorbic Acid (Vitamin C) 29mg
Zinc (as Zinc Oxide) 7.5mg

Contains: Crustacean products. Fish products.

Allergen Contains: Crustacean| Fish

Directions

Take 2 tablets daily for a minimum of 3-6 months (1 in the morning and 1 in the evening) taken with water after food. Viviscal tablets are easy to swallow. Do not exceed the recommended daily intake.

USAGE ADVICE

For best results use in conjunction with our Viviscal Man Fortifying Shampoo, made with our Ana:Tel™ complex plus a blend of biotin, keratin and zinc.

STORAGE INSTRUCTIONS

Store in a cool, dry place below 30°C and avoid excessive heat. Tamper resistant.

Storage Temperature: Below 30°C.

Recyclable Packaging?: Yes
